about_the_game:
About 

Dive into a chaotic, fear-fueled multiplayer brawl for 2-8 players, where you’ll outwit, scare, and eliminate your friends using their deepest, darkest fears — all while they’re plotting to do the same to you!

Designed to spark late-night chaos between friends, this game truly shines when played with your entire friend group. The more players, the wilder the gameplay experience! Prefer a bigger challenge? Jump into public lobbies and face off against strangers too!

This indie multiplayer game is a passion project, developed entirely by just one person.

Objective

  • Win by having the most kills at the end of the game

  • Collect bloodbones to call upon Fobias to torment your friends

  • Hide in the shadows concealing your location to other players

  • Customize your character with a wide variety of options

Features

  • Character Customization – Choose your character, mix and match outfits, and arm yourself with unique weapons to express your style.

  • Game Customization – Host public or private lobbies and tweak game rules to suit your playstyle. Fast-paced chaos or sneaky tactics? You decide!

  • Public & Private Matches – Play with friends in private lobbies or jump into public games to challenge players worldwide.

  • Use Their Fears Against Them – Outsmart and scare your opponents by exploiting their worst fears. Hunt or be hunted!

  • Chaotic Fun Every Match – No two games are the same! Adapt, strategize, and cause mayhem in every round.

  • Quick & Easy Matchmaking – Seamless lobby creation and fast matchmaking keep the chaos going all night long!
